DOC.brief_summary: Retrospective follow-up study former eat disorder patient child- adolescent psychiatry psychiatric symptom social intelligence .
DOC.brief_title: Follow-up Eating Disorder Patients From 15-year Period .
DOC.detailed_description: Former patient parent contact 3 15 year complete treatment eat disorder Levanger Hospital , Child Adolescent Psychiatry Department , period 1988 2002 . Interviews focus general psychiatric symptom , specific eat disorder symptom , social intelligence consumer satisfaction . Parents also contact interviewed consumer satisfaction .
